about_the_game:
In Grime and Gold you play as a street alchemist, crafting potions by stacking and mixing cards. Your goal is to discover new recipes, manage scarce resources, and race against time to serve demanding clients. The game blends strategy and time management in a gritty, tense atmosphere, where every decision could lead to success—or disaster.

Open boosters

Want some ingredients for your potions ? Our shady sellers got you, but you'll have to open boosters to get them... You'll get random ingredients from them, and sometimes weird surprises as well. Manage your ressources, because they will be sparse. If you manage well, you'll complete quests and get rewarded ! If you don't, be prepared.

Make potions and serve clients

A good alchemist should always thrive in discovering new weird brews. Use your ingredients in the right way with your trusty cauldron to make potions and whatever the clients need, because in here, the client is king, and a bloody one...

Find new recipes

Open your grimoire of recipes and find how to make everything that the clients need, and maybe find new potions to make !

content_descriptors.notes: Depicts a dark fantasy sewer street, where mugglers can harm you to rob you, but portrayed simply by cards, no real animations
